original_title: Sri Lanka extends deadline to restructure EPF debt to Aug 28
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka has extended a deadline to restructure the rupee debt of the Employees Provident Fund to August 28 from August 11, the Finance Ministry said.

“Following further feedback from Eligible Holders, in accordance with the terms of the Invitation to Exchange,  the Republic today announces certain amendments to the timeline for the Invitation to Exchange,” the statement said.
